bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Robert Lynch Montague (1864-1932) was a prominent Richmond, Virginia, attorney. He was the brother of Governor Andrew Jackson Montague (1862-1937). Montague died in January 1932 and is buried in Christ Episcopal Church in Middlesex County, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Papers, 1882-1914, of Robert Lynch Montague (1864-1932) of Richmond, Virginia, containing his legal and political correspondence. Legal correspondence concerns cases and matters upon which he worked and political correspondence covers Virginia and national politics, specifically the political career of his brother Andrew Jackson Montague (1862-1937) Governor of Virginia and congressman. Collection contains some correspondence of Andrew Jackson Montague. Collection also includes a volume of Robert Lynch Montague's legal notes.
